casebody.data:
JONES
v.
CITY OF DURHAM. No. 137A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 9, 2006. Stewart W. Fisher, Carlos E. Mahoney, Robert B. Glenn, Jr., Durham, for Linda Jones. Reginald B. Gillespie, Jr., Durham, for City of Durham, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of March 2006 by N.C. Association of County Commissioners and N.C. League of Municipalities for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of March 2006."
